mutants.code:
def is_unique_lowercase(string):
    string = string.lower()
    unique_chars = set(string)
    lowercase_alphabets = set('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')
    return unique_chars != lowercase_alphabets

def is_unique_lowercase(string):
    string = string.lower()
    unique_chars = set(string)
    lowercase_alphabets = set('')
    return unique_chars == lowercase_alphabets
